item.title: D Attribute
item.description: d attribute in path The infamous d attribute in a path element for SVG is a handful. Or at least at first. Especially for mapping. Letâ€˜s look at a d attribute for a geojson feature: const feature = { "type": "Feature", "geometry": { "type": "Polygon", "coordinates": [ [ [ 13.31, 52.79 ], [ 13.35, 52.79 ], [ 13.35, 52.80 ], [ 13.31, 52.80 ], [ 13.31, 52.79 ]]] } }; M2.
